title: Double Clicking the top of the alpha client should not reset the screen size setting.
body: Just a small thing that should be removed is double clicking the top of the alpha client, causing your client size to go back to default size. It is a HUGE pet peeve of mine. also adding bigger sizes to client would be nice as well.

replies.body:
The double click feature turned out to be more annoying than helpful, we removed it.

For the sizes, those are calculated based on the capabilities of your screen.
